meanings.definition: Not protected or covered with insulation.
meanings.sent1: The uninsulated pipes froze in the winter.
meanings.sent2: The house felt cold because it was uninsulated.
meanings.sent3: The uninsulated ice cream melted quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her uninsulated heart felt the full force of the harsh words.
meanings.sent5: The uninsulated wire sparked and sizzled dangerously.

meanings.sent1: The uninsulated attic was too hot in the summer.
meanings.sent2: The room was drafty because it was uninsulated.
meanings.sent3: The uninsulated sandwich got soggy from the condensation.
meanings.sent4: His uninsulated thoughts were exposed for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The uninsulated roof let in the sound of the rain, creating a soothing rhythm.
